document.docAuthor: Motamedinia, Behnam, Skevington, Jeffrey H. & Kelso, Scott
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Tomosvaryella Aczél (Diptera: Pipunculidae) in the Middle East, with description of 19 new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of Tomosvaryella Aczél (Diptera: Pipunculidae) in the Middle East, with description of 19 new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pipunculus subvirescens Loew, 1872
.—syn.
De Meyer (1996) : p. 95
.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 38. Male genitalia of
Tomosvaryella subtransvaalensis
sp. nov. ,
holotype (JSS51765, TAU) A) dorsal view, B) ventral view, C) ejaculatory apodeme, D, E) lateral view.

FIGURE 39. Male genitalia of
Tomosvaryella subvirescens
(CNCD174944, CNC) A) dorsal view, B) ventral view, C) ejaculatory apodeme, D, E) lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Specimens examined:
IRAN : Sistan & Baluchestan : Saravan , 27°25’N , 62°17’E ,
12.v.2013
, F. Hamzavi , pan trap , JSS51916 ( 1♂ , CNC )
;
ISRAEL : Ne’ot haKikkar, 30°56’N , 35°22’E ,
1.v.1997
, A. Freidberg , JSS51694 ( 1♂ , TAU )
;
QATAR : Al Shamal distnict, Al Zubarah exclusion zone, Grassy meadow, 25°58’N , 51°02’E ,
20.iii.2012
, K. P. Puliafico & A. M. Jensen , yellow & white pan traps , JSS52318 –9 ( 2♂ , CNC )
;
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES : Bithnah , 25°06’N , 56°08’E ,
4–26.iii.2006
, A. van Harten , light trap , JSS52240 ( 1♂ , CNC ); NARC
,
near Sweihan , 24°14’N , 55°16’E ,
9–20.ix.2005
, A. van Harten , light trap , CNCD174944–7 ( 4♂ , CNC ); Wadi Maidaq , 25°11’N , 56°04’E ,
7–14.iii.2006
, A. van Harten , pan trap , CNCD8951 ( 1♂ , USNM ); Wadi Wurayah farm, 25°14’N , 56°11’E ,
17–24.iii.2009
, A. van Harten , Malaise trap ; CNCD137124–5 , CNCD137128 ( 3♂ , CNC );
19.iv–19.v.2009
, A. van Harten , Malaise trap , CNCD137532 , CNCD137534 , CNCD137536 , CNCD137538 , CNCD137540 , CNCD137545 , CNCD137552 ( 7♂ , CNC );
24–30.iii.2009
, A. van Harten , Malaise trap , CNCD136930 , CNCD136932 ( 2♂ , CNC );
31.v–14.vi.2009
, A. van Harten , Malaise trap , CNCD137578 ( 1♂ , EAD ); Wadi Wurayah , 25°14’N , 56°11’E ,
19– 26.iv.2009
, A. van Harten , Malaise trap , CNCD160583 ( 1♂ , CNC ); al-Rafa, 25°26’N , 55°31’E ,
20–23.iv.2009
, A. van Harten , pan trap , CNCD189979 ( 1♂ , CNC ); near ad-Dhaid, 25°13’N , 55°35’E ,
16–19.iii.2007
, J. Btelka , pan trap , CNCD159476 , CNCD159478–9 , CNCD159483–4 , CNCD159486 , CNCD159488 ( 7♂ , CNC )
.

Distribution: Bahamas , Belize , Bermuda , Brazil , Canada , Chile , Colombia , Costa Rica , Cuba , Dominica , Egypt , Gabon , Iran , Israel , Jamaica , Mexico , Mozambique , Namibia , Nicaragua , Panama , Peru , Puerto Rico , Qatar , Thailand , the United States , United Arab Emirates ( Skevington 2020 ) ( Fig. 64 ).

Note: DNA barcodes of
T. subvirescens
overlap with
T. pilosiventris
. See the notes under
T. pilosiventris .
